name: Health Potion
description: A basic healing potion that restores HP.
note: Basic healing item available in most shops

name: Mana Potion
description: A basic mana potion that restores MP.
note: Basic mana restoration item

name: Cultivation Pill - Foundation
description: A basic cultivation pill that aids in spiritual foundation building. Grants experience when consumed.
note: Grants 100 experience points - aids in early cultivation

name: Qi Gathering Pill
description: A refined pill that helps gather and refine spiritual qi. Used by 8th Grade Warriors.
note: Grants 250 experience points - for Refining Qi stage

name: Spirit Refining Elixir
description: A precious elixir that enhances spiritual perception and intuition. Favored by 7th Grade cultivators.
note: Grants 500 experience points - for Refining Spirit stage

name: Golden Core Essence
description: Extremely rare essence used in forming the Taoist Golden Core. Only for advanced cultivators.
note: Grants 1500 experience points - for Golden Core formation

name: Confucian Wisdom Scroll
description: A scroll containing profound Confucian teachings. Enhances moral cultivation and scholarly knowledge.
note: Grants 200 experience points - Confucian cultivation aid

name: Buddhist Meditation Beads
description: Sacred beads blessed by high monks. Aids in meditation and spiritual enlightenment.
note: Grants 300 experience points - Buddhist cultivation aid

name: Guardian's Badge
description: Official badge of the Night Watchmen. Provides authority and access to restricted areas.
note: Key item - proves Guardian membership and authority

name: Investigation Kit
description: A set of modern investigative tools adapted for the Dafeng Dynasty. Unique to Xu Qi'an.
note: Key item - enables advanced investigation techniques

name: Royal Seal
description: Princess Lin'an's personal seal. Grants imperial authority for official matters.
note: Key item - enables use of imperial authority

name: Strategic Manual
description: Wei Yuan's personal collection of military strategies and tactical knowledge.
note: Key item - unlocks advanced tactical abilities

name: Sangbo Lake Fragment
description: A mysterious fragment from the Sangbo Lake explosion. Contains unknown supernatural power.
note: Key item - central to the main story mystery

name: Taoist Talisman
description: A protective talisman inscribed with Taoist symbols. Provides spiritual protection.
note: Provides temporary protection against supernatural attacks

name: Confucian Righteousness Charm
description: A charm imbued with Confucian moral power. Strengthens resolve and moral clarity.
note: Enhances resistance to mental manipulation and fear

name: Buddhist Purification Incense
description: Sacred incense that purifies negative karma and spiritual corruption.
note: Removes negative status effects from all party members

name: Ancient Clue Fragment
description: A piece of evidence from an ancient mystery. May be important for investigations.
note: Investigation item - used in deduction sequences

name: Witness Testimony
description: Written testimony from a witness. Contains important information for case resolution.
note: Investigation item - key evidence for solving cases

name: Mysterious Letter
description: An encrypted letter containing secret information. Requires decoding skills to understand.
note: Investigation item - requires Logic Analysis skill to decode

name: Gu Master's Poison Vial
description: A vial containing potent Gu poison. Dangerous but potentially useful for investigations.
note: Poison damage item - inflicts poison status

name: Warlock's Divination Crystal
description: A crystal used by warlocks for divination and prophecy. Reveals hidden information.
note: Reveals hidden clues and future events

name: Imperial Edict
description: An official imperial decree. Carries the full authority of the Emperor.
note: Ultimate authority item - overrides most obstacles

name: Realm Society Token
description: A mysterious token marking membership in the secretive Realm Society.
note: Key item - grants access to secret society content
